about_the_game:
First gift code: ymjg8888

Second gift code: ymjg0103

Exchange method: Benefits----Customer Service-related----Pck Exchange

Wonderland X：Next Dream is a 3D fantasy martial arts MMO client game, using next-generation technology to create a real fantasy world of immortal cultivation. Thunder explodes, and the peerless martial arts Wu Mu Treasure Book reappears in the world. Under the undercurrent, talents emerge from the hidden sects. A bloody storm has come, and the young swordsman with secret skills has embarked on the road to becoming a strong man in the world. The huge immortal martial arts world where you can take revenge, the ingeniously created immersive map, the sharp and freehand light skills, the challenge of countless rare animals in the Classic of Mountains and Seas, the exciting and exciting battle with Songshan, create a dream of martial arts that belongs only to you.

Game Features

——Beautiful Jianghu, Pure Martial Arts

Lin'an, Tingfeng Pavilion, Jiangnan Town... are committed to creating a real world of hot-blooded Jianghu. The game adopts a realistic 3D aesthetic style, and uses cutting-edge weather changes and light and shadow systems to present a vivid fantasy martial arts world.

——Martial arts secrets to reverse the situation

All kinds of martial arts, exclusive combat skills of the sect, dodge and move sword nets, leap and sprint, and release moves in the air. The battle for hegemony in Songshan, the fantasy martial arts conference enriches the confrontation experience and helps you reverse the situation in the martial arts world.

——Sweet social interaction exclusive to love, you can get married and have children

Martial arts competition, horoscope matching, romantic wedding, sedan chair parade, exciting bride grabbing, and immortal love dungeons are all available! This is an interactive swordsman with flesh and blood and love.

——Diverse PVE gameplay, interesting advanced growth

Rich PVE activities, endless fun: new experience Zhuxian swordsman mission, feel the wonder of random missions; guard the gang, all gang members work together to resist foreign enemies; cool and cute spirit pets, rare mounts, accompany you to fight alone in the world...

——Fair drop of top-quality equipment, free trade

Top-quality equipment is fair drop after killing BOSS, not bound, and fully free trading allows you to experience overnight wealth.

name: Wonderland X：Next Dream

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win10-11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G5400/AMD Ryzen 32200G
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000/ Nvidia GeForce 710/AMD
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win10-11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G5400/AMD Ryzen 32200G
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000/ Nvidia GeForce 710/AMD
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Wonderland X：Next Dream is a 3D fantasy MMO client game. It is an immersive map created with great ingenuity. You can challenge countless rare and exotic beasts and create a world that belongs only to you. Dream.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*, Indonesian*
*languages with full audio support
